detaileddescription.para:
It constructs a SpatialMovementManager object associated to the MovableSpatialObject
simulationModel
The model which controls the simulation
sObject
The associated MovableSpatialObject which should be a descendant of the MovableSpatialEntity or MovableSpatialSimProcess

Informs the SpatialMovementManager that the associated object is attached to another MovableSpatialObject.
host
The MovableSpatialObject to attach to.
Cancel the current scheduled or buffered MovingDoneEvent.
Cancel the current scheduled or buffered RotatingDoneEvent.
Notifies the SpatialMovementManager to cancel the current movement.
Notifies the SpatialMovementManager to cancel the current rotation.
Remove attachment to a MovableSpatialObject.

Gets the current Movement object, if it exist.
The current Movement object which contains data about the current movement.

Gets the current position while the object is attached.
The current position.

Gets the current position on Track
The current position on Track

Gets the current Rotation object, if exists.
The Rotation object which contains the data about the roation performed now.

Returns a rotation object which contains the current rotational data during a rotation.
A rotation object with the rotation axis, the rotated angle and the elapsed rotation time.

Gets the current speed while the object is attached.
The current speed.

Gets the current moving speed.
The current moving speed.

Gets the current matrix while the object is attached.
The current matrix.

Gets the matrix with the rotational information resulted from the moving with FocusOnTack.
The matrix with the rotational information.

Moves the associated MovableSpatialObject to the position of an other SpatialObject with the given duration.
destination
The destination of the movement.
enttryPointName
The name of the specific entry point at the destination object, which should be steered to.
simDuration
The duration of the movement in SimTime.

memberdef.argsstring: (SpatialObject destination, String entryPointName, TimeSpan simDuration, double maxSpeed, double acc, double dec)
memberdef.name: move

detaileddescription.para: Moves the associated MovableSpatialObject to the position of an other SpatialObject with the given duration, maximum speed, acceleration and deceleration. The character of the movement depends on the initialized parameters. (O = initialized, X = not initialized(means <=0 or null)):
case 1: duration O, maxSpeed O, acc & dec O: The movement will be performed according to the parameters. If the given parameters can't be satisfied, an IllegalMoveException will be thrown.
case 2: duration X, maxSpeed O, acc & dec O: The object will be moved to the destination with the fastest speed possible.

case 3: duration O, maxSpeed X, acc & dec O: The object will move to the destination with the given acceleration and deceleration and try to reach the destination in time. If the given parameters can't be satisfied, an IllegalMoveException will be thrown.
case 4: duration X, maxSpeed X, acc & dec O: The object will be accelerated and followed by a decdleration. There's no constant phase in the movement.

case 5: duration O, maxSpeed O, acc or dec X: The object will start with the speed needed to arrive the destination in the given time and break suddenly to zero at the end of the movement. The maxSpeed gives the speed limit of the movement. If the given parameters can't be satisfied, an IllegalMoveException will be thrown.
case 6: duration X, maxSpeed O, acc or dec X: The movement will start with the maxSpeed and stops the destination.
case 7: duration O, maxSpeed X, acc or dec X: The movement will start with the speed needed to arrive the destination with the duration given.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the specific entry point at the destination object, which should be steered to. (optional)
The specific maximum speed for this movement. (optional)
The specific acceleration value for this movement. (optional)
The specific deceleration value for this movement. (optional)

Moves the associated MovableSpatialObject to the position of an other SpatialObject.
destination
The destination of the movement.
enttryPointName

Move the associated MovableSpatialObject according to the given movement object.
movement
The movement which should be performed.

Notifies the SpatialMovementManager that a movement is done and begin with the update of the coordinates.
data
The SpatialData which should be updated.

data

Rotate the object with the given angle and duration about the X-axis.

The angle to rotate about the X axis in radians.
duration
The duration for the rotation.

The angle to rotate about the Y axis in radians.
duration
The duration for the rotation.

angle
The angle to rotate about the Z axis in radians.
duration
The duration for the rotation.
Sets the front side vector in this manager.

parameterdescription.para: The front side vector to be set.

detaileddescription.para:
Schedules and organizes the order of the MovingDone-/RotatingDoneEvent. If both are present, compare them and schedule the one which ends first and save the other one for later.
evt
The new Moving-/RotatingDoneEvent which wants to be scheduled.
simDuration
The duration when this event should be process since now.
Check whether there is a unscheduled Moving-/RotatingDoneEvent waiting to be scheduled. If there is, schedule it.

A SpatialMovementManager is (only) associated to every movable descendant of MovableSpatialEntity and MovableSpatialSimProcess. It serves the interaction between the SpatialObjects, the IVisualObject, and the simulation model. It gets tracks from the model,calculates the duration, holds it self back during the animation and updates the coordinates to the SpatialObjects.
